blogPost.title: Why is diversity a benefit for companies? Answer by Marjorie Janiewicz (@Toucas), Senior Vice President, HackerOne. https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ダイバーシティはなぜ企業にとってメリットがあるのでしょうか？HackerOne上級副社長のMarjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）さんの回答です。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
为什么多样性对公司来说是一种好处？HackerOne高级副总裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM
爲什麼多樣性對公司來說是一種好處？HackerOne高級副總裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/LorHvMoUd6 https://t.co/9ico6Xx3iM

previous.title: How can parents help their children not fall behind in school? Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f

localize.full_text: 子供が学校で遅れを取らないようにするには、親はどうすればいいですか？Answer by @KathrynStarke, Literacy Consultant, Author, Founder of The Starke School. https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何帮助他们的孩子不在学校里落后？回答者：@KathrynStarke，识字顾问、作家、Starke学校的创始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f
父母如何幫助他們的孩子不在學校裏落後？回答者：@KathrynStarke，識字顧問、作家、Starke學校的創始人。https://t.co/EMTDFN1rSw https://t.co/0nc7ixcP3f

next.title: What are the key financial mistakes to avoid when opening your first bank account? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH

localize.full_text: 初めて銀行口座を開設する際に避けなければならない金融上の失敗とは？Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH
在开立第一个银行账户时要避免哪些关键的金融错误？回答者：Poulomi Damany，资产部总经理 @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH
在開立第一個銀行賬戶時要避免哪些關鍵的金融錯誤？回答者：Poulomi Damany，資產部總經理 @creditkarma. https://t.co/XGqHVCO4f9 https://t.co/iksuEYtMtH
